overview: Gershon (Dubi Gal) is a mechanic who wants to go out with his mistress (Elana Shoshan) to a hotel in Eilat for holiday. To go on vacation is lying to his wife and says he had to come up for duty in the Golan Heights. His wife believe the deception and taking the opportunity to go out with her ​​lover to the same hotel in Eilat.
title: Leave My Wife Alone
